DOC.brief_summary: This Belgian prospective multicentre registry evaluate safety performance Sinus-Superflex-Visual stent ( Optimed ) Superficial Femoral Artery ( SFA ) atherosclerotic lesion . Target number 500 patient approximately 11 centre . Patients follow period 2 year .
DOC.brief_title: Belgian Prospective Multicentre Registry Evaluate Safety Performance Optimed Stent Superficial Femoral Artery
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Stenosis ( > 75 % ) occlusion superficial femoral artery ( lesion 3 cm distal Hunter 's canal 4 cm proximal patella ) TASC II ( 2007 ) type A , B C lesion Target vessel diameter 4.5 7 mm Debilitating claudication critical limb ischemia ( Rutherford 2 5 ) At least 1 outflow vessel ankle Patient least 18 year old Life expectancy > 2 year Patient compliant request followup visit No inform consent Rutherford 6 TASC II type D lesion Patient 18 year old Patient pregnant Acute ischemia Patient compliant request followup visit Unable cross target lesion guidewire Patient allergic nickeltitanium Presence aneurysm SFA
